description: This file contains functions and types for integrating with Jira API, including authentication, fetching issue types, issues, users, priorities, updating issues, creating issues, bulk issue creation from Excel files, and managing issue transitions. It is a core part of a Jira integration library in a Next.js project.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates user with Jira using provided credentials, sets auth cookie, and redirects to dashboard.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes Jira auth cookie and redirects to home page.

methods.name: getIssueTypesForProject
methods.description: Fetches issue types available for a specific Jira project.

methods.name: getIssuesForProjectAndType
methods.description: Retrieves issues for a specific project and issue type.

methods.name: getIssuesForProject
methods.description: Retrieves all issues for a specific project, handling pagination.

methods.name: bulkCreateIssues
methods.description: Reads an Excel file from form data and creates multiple Jira issues in bulk, with detailed error handling.

methods.name: getUsersForProject
methods.description: Fetches assignable users for a Jira project.

methods.name: getEditMeta
methods.description: Retrieves editable fields metadata for a specific Jira issue.

methods.name: getAvailableTransitions
methods.description: Fetches possible status transitions for a Jira issue.

methods.name: transitionIssue
methods.description: Transitions a Jira issue to a new status.

methods.name: updateIssue
methods.description: Updates fields of a Jira issue, including handling status transitions.

methods.name: createIssue
methods.description: Creates a new Jira issue with specified form data.

methods.name: generateDynamicCsvTemplate
methods.description: Generates a CSV template with example data for importing issues into a Jira project.
